document.text:
Please note my new office address and preferred email address: 
BOBBI C. STERNHEIM, ESQ. 
Law 
Offices of Bobbi C. Sternheim 
225 Broadway, Suite 
715 
New York, NY 10007 
This message and any attached documents contain information from the Law Offices of Bobbi C. Stemheim 
that may be confidential and/or privileged. 
If you are not the intended recipient, you may not read, copy, distribute, or use this information. 
If you have received this transmission in error, please notify the sender immediately by reply e-mail and 
then delete this message. Thank you. 
On Oct 12, 2021, at 10:02 PM wrote: 
Good evening, 
The Government filed the 
letter on ECF this evening. In what format would the Court like a copy of the materials? 
Respectfully, 
From: Nathan NYSD Chambers < 
Sent: Tuesda , October 12, 2021 5:32 PM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: Re: US v. Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330 (AJN) - Joint Proposed Juror Questionnaire and Voir Dire 
Counsel: 
Consistent with the Court's Individual Rules, if one or both sides are requesting sealing, the letter making that 
request must be docketed on ECF unless counsel is also seeking, with explanation and justification, to file the 
letter under seal. 
The Court would also like a copy of the Jencks Act material and exhibits. 
Sincerely, 
EFTA00011113

Chambers of the Hon. Alison J. Nathan 
From 
Sent: Monday, October 11, 
To: Nathan NYSD Chambers 
CAUTION - EXTERNAL: 
Good evening, 
Subject: US v. Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330 (AJN) - Joint Proposed Juror Questionnaire and Voir Dire 
Attached please find the parties' joint proposed juror questionnaire and voir dire. Per the attached letter, the parties 
respectfully request that the Court accept the joint proposed juror questionnaire and voir dire under seal. 
In addition, the Government has produced Jencks Act material and exhibits to the defense today. If the Court would like 
a copy, we would be happy to provide it. 
Respectfully submitted, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
United States Attorney's Office 
Southern District of New York 
One St. Andrew's Plaza 
New York, New York 10007 
CAUTION - 
EXTERNAL EMAIL: This email originated outside the Judiciary. Exercise caution when opening 
attachments or clicking on links. 
EFTA00011114
